story.text: Jan 2 Evolving Systems Inc. (EVOL.O) named Executive Vice President Thad Dupper its new president and said he would also replace Stephen Gartside as the company's chief executive by the second quarter of 2007. Gartside, who was also the president, would become the company's chairman, replacing George Hallenbeck. Hallenbeck would continue as a board member. Evolving Systems expects the changes to be completed by April 1, it said in a statement. (Reporting by Swagata Gupta in Bangalore)
story.title: evolving systems names ceo , chairman
